description: The Chief Electoral Officer of Canada (CEOC), an agent of Parliament, exercises general direction and supervision over the conduct of elections and referendums at the federal level. The CEOC heads the Office of the Chief Electoral Officer, commonly known as Elections Canada. This requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-191297/C. Estimated number of contracts to be awarded: 1. All Supply Arrangement holders from EN578-191297/C have been invited to bid.
duration_in_months: Well past the end of October, 2023
full_summary:
# 45th General Election T-Shirts Tender

## Tender Information

### General Information

* **Title (English/French)**: 45th General Election CRO T-Shirts / 45e élection générale - T-shirts pour adultes
* **Reference Number (English/French)**: cb-7088-75055295 / None
* **Amendment Number (English/French)**: 1 / 1
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-01T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start/End Dates**: None

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method (English/French)**: Competitive - Selective tendering / Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif
* **Procurement Status (English/French)**: Expired / Expiré
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) / Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR) / Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

### Bidder Information

* **Bid Submission**: Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation (electronic transmission only)
* **Bid Documents**: Solicitation documents available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/occasions-de-marche)
* **Inquiries**: Directed to the Contracting Authority only

### Contract Details

* **Contract Period**: From effective contract start date to October 18, 2023 (Initial Term)
* **Extension**: 6-month period option under the same terms and conditions
* **Security**: No security requirements applicable
* **Incumbent**: Work is currently not being performed by a contractor

### Equal Opportunity Statement

Elections Canada is committed to equal opportunity and welcomes the submission of bids from qualified suppliers.

## Pratt of the Tender Notice

Please note that the information contained in this notice is a brief description of the requirement and is for information purposes only. Bidders must refer to the complete solicitation document for a full description of the requirement and the full bid instructions.

The main responsibility of the suppliers is to provide the required materials and services. The requirements include:
- supply all materials
- imprint and produce as specified and as per artwork provided
- provide proofs prior to production for each
